players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other to ensure we don't lose any more town members."
Diana: "I agree with Bob's sentiment. Let's all be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
You: "I'm shocked about Charlie being killed. We need to think carefully about who could have done this. Bob and Diana, do either of you have any insights or suspicions we should discuss?"
You: "Diana, you were very quick to agree with Bob without offering any original thoughts. That seems suspicious to me. What are your actual thoughts on who might be the mafioso?"
